reviews.text: This place is AWSOME!! The menu is simple, what makes this place is the staff and service they provide. Courtesy and professionalism abounds. They treat you like you really matter. Thumbs up all day.
The best in the city and really makes you feel like you eating at the homies house ! Good service good food and fire atmosphere please slide by any means necessary when you in the city !

Since you started making stop at 99th street and Madison Avenue to your shop in the BX. Gotta go to the one in BK one of these days. Dope spot my all time fave still el Dominicano. Keep on striving for more.

Owner‚Äôs always super attentive ! I‚Äôve tried multiple items on their menu and haven‚Äôt been disappointed yet ! I struggle to find a spot that accommodates me as much as this spot does ! Well worth the travel & the food is always on point !!

This restaurant deserves 5 Stars! From hospitality, to service, and the food.....best chop cheese in NYC! I had the pleasure of having it when he was also just a food truck! Never disappoints! Don't get me started on the wings! Never cheap with sauces and so juicy! Can't wait to go to the bklyn spot! Plus giving free items with your orders adds the bang for your buck! Where else will you find water for a dollar in shops?! OVERALL 5/5 ALWAYS COMING BACK!!!
Incredible food and hospitality. Definitely recommend!

This place definitely deserves 5 stars! The food is incredible the chopped cheese in particular is one of the best you‚Äôll find anywhere. Everything is always fresh, flavorful, and served with care. The owner is a very humble and cool guy who truly takes pride in what he does, and he always delivers when it comes to service.

What makes it even better is that I‚Äôve been a continuous client since the days when he was just working out of his truck. To see him grow and now have not just one, but two stores is truly amazing. You can tell he put extreme effort and love into the design of the place the decorations and details on the walls really make it stand out and give it such a welcoming vibe.

I highly recommend this place 100%. It‚Äôs inspiring to see someone build something so special from the ground up, and the food and experience never disappoint.

Bodega City in the Bronx is amazing! The food is always fresh and flavorful. Their chopped cheese is unmatched‚Äîtruly the best you‚Äôll find anywhere. The wings are delicious too. Great spot with NY vibes, highly recommend!
Great food
My brother bought me a chopped cheese yesterday and it was dry, mozzarella sticks tasted like freezer burn but the chicken tender wrap was amazing.

Google made me edit this post. The art on the wall is Cool the chopped cheese didn‚Äôt taste like nothing special but they were better than the wings and by the owner thinks he‚Äôs gods gift to woman  and acts like he‚Äôs all that. Somebody tell him he‚Äôs not Aventura. Happy  Google?

This place is only take out. Call ahead of time for pick up because the hours can change.
Food made with perfection.

The store was hard to find because it‚Äôs inside of another store. I ordered the classic chop cheese and to be honest I‚Äôve had better in Harlem, for a lesser price tag. I also ordered the loaded fries. They were okay. No need to go back.

Been following dude since he was rolling around on the food truck. Boy was I surprised when he set up shop right up the block from me. The food is still great as always and happy to have this gem in the heart of Highbridge.

I came to try the chopped cheese I heard so much about online, and was pleasantly impressed. I was expecting something heavier, but that wasn‚Äôt the case. The sandwiches are not overwhelming, they are perfectly balanced and at an incredible price. In this economy I am always looking for a deal!

I got the Mac, the OG, and el Dominicano.
The Mac tasted sooo much like what a Big Mac should be( think 2000‚Äôs Big Mac). The OG was solid and the Dominicano was absolutely delicious.

Jeremy was took our order and was so kind. He gave us some curly fries and a couple of drinks and candy with our order.

This is located inside the Ogden market, it‚Äôs super clean and they even have restrooms available.
The Fries are Fireeeeeee !! However I had the OG chop cheese it was nothing spectacular or to go out of my way for not a wow factor for me.
FROM THE TRUCK TO THE STORE ! BEST CHOP CHEESE IN THIS CITY
It‚Äôs pretty basic any deli is way better, the Ke lo ke fries was the best thing we got!
I tried the OG chopped cheese and the adobo üçü. Both were delicious. I had to come out and support this business. I highly recommend this restaurant to friends and family.
